Parallels.ab: staōmī aṣ̌əm ~ VrS1.12, VrS25.14, VrS27.28, VrS90.12 aṣ̌ahe vahištahe staōϑβahe; ~ VrS2.14, VrS17.13, VrS77.13 aṣ̌əm vahištəm staōϑβəm.
staōmī aṣ̌əm quoted by colophons 2610 [K7b], 2620 [M51a] staomi aṣ̌əm ... (Pahl.) stāyēm ahlāyīh.

Nerangs.ab: zōt dast abar barsom nihādan ud staōmi aṣ̌əm bē gōwišn u-š barsom az māhrōy ul stānišn
"The zōt should put the hand on the barsom and, at staōmi aṣ̌əm, take up the barsom from the māhrōy."
staōmīdast abar barsom nihādan ud barsom ul stānišn aṣ̌əm.
"Between staōmi and aṣ̌əm (the zōt) should put his hand on the barsom and take up the barsom."

Quotations.ab: u-š pad staōmi pāy ī dašn andar [gāh ī] zōtān nihišn... ast kē ēdōn gōwēd ay hād staōmi aṣ̌əm ka nē pad barsom gōwēd ā nē šāyēd
"At staōmi, he has to put his right food on the place of the zōt ... There is one commentator who says that, if he does not recite staōmi, then it is not allowed."
